headline: Synopsys set to gain EU approval for $35bn acquisition of Ansys
summary: To address competition concerns, Synopsys has proposed selling its Optical Solutions Group and Ansys PowerArtist.

raw.headline: Synopsys set to gain EU approval for $35bn acquisition of Ansys
